item.title: Basic Commands
item.description: Table of Contents (Click to expand) Home Chat Island/Cave Areas Grief Prevention Miscellaneous Commands Argument Required <> Required [] Optional Home These commands are affecting by your rank. For example a normal member gets only 1 home. See Ranks for more info! /sethome [name] [-o] Sets your home at a current location.
